showerReviews.reviewText: great facility!  I have only one complaint.  The men's locker room showers are slowly getting worse and worse.  The shower heads are often faulty.  The on/off valves are faulty.  it's not that clean.
The employees & other members are the best part of the Nuuanu YMCA. The facilities require upgrading, the exercise machines are great. The locker room is too old, the shower room is horrible.

showerReviews.reviewText: Beautiful beach and beautiful view. Water is calm and the jetty makes for some good snorkeling. They have a public restroom and a shower. Also, less people here than Waikiki and a good spot for watching sunset and the gorgeous diamond head. ‚Ä¶

Peaceful, quiet, plenty of space when we went. Beautiful sunset.

There's picnic tables, restrooms, rinse area - a couple missing shower heads - I did not see beach chair rentals on this side. There's grass area for picnics as well.
We didn't go through the entire park but it's beautiful with lots of foliage. It's between the street & coast. There's also bathrooms & a shower to rinse off.
Beach has lovely sort sand, lots of rocks under water. There are many facilities nearby. No stall doors in women's restroom, convenient shower, comfortable picnic table near the beach.

It's a great place to go hang out, relax, or play volleyball... they even have grills for your use over there.. tennis courts... bathrooms, outside shower , etc... only thing is halekoa has some construction going on right now
Gorgeous for sunsets! Has access to a beach shower and restrooms.
Beach narrow, no shower to rinse off after
Has outdoor shower to rinse off

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ is a great place to go to catch an unobstructed (unless a boat üö¢ floats by) view of the sunset. There's a restroom and a shower for people that want to take a dive off the rocks. There are also lots of stray cats that are in the rock area. ‚Ä¶

This place is beautiful clean well maintained next to the ocean out door theatre walk path. Shower, sitting on top of hill looking at the blue ocean surf it's beautiful. Lots of free parking trees. Good swimming clean waters.
‚Ä¶ Note: There are lots of wild cats around but they don't seem harmful at all. :) Lots of homeless too, but they aren't really in the way, only in the shower areas. Didn't bother me at all.
Lots of surfers out in the distance.  Hilly climb up from the parking lot to get to the bathroom, the main walkway which overlooks the expansive ocean, and shower(s) for surfers/swimmers.

showerReviews.reviewText: Beautiful beach and park. Perfect for everyone with family or none, with public restroom and shower. This is the perfect beach for those who want to do their swimming laps.

‚Ä¶ Has shower to rinse off sand. ‚úÖ ‚Ä¶

Sunset is good here. Flat water, life guards present, no major drop in the water level so it‚Äôs good for kids. Shower clean and available. Parking right across from foodland and ala Moana with makes it an easy stop.

‚Ä¶ saw a poo floating by, I knew it was time to get out of the water. I told myself it was dog, but I have to admit that I still suspected it had human origins. Fortunately, there was a clean bath house in the park where I could take a shower!
Beautiful clean beach. One shower wasn‚Äôt working but was fixed pretty quickly. Water/man made lagoon is great for young swimmers. Recommended! Went to the mall right after !

showerReviews.reviewText: Great views of the sunset and you can see the friday night fireworks really well from here. There was ample parking, a bathroom and shower. The beach had quite a bit of small rocks/stones but no biggie
